title: Establish WiFi connection between PC and B593s-931
answer:
A: Please follow these steps to set up your WLAN 

 1. Enable your wireless network card and double click![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=32646) icon displayed on windows start bar to open “Choose a wireless network” dialog 

 2. Select SSID of B593s-931 in the local wireless device list (You can see the WiFi SSID and WiFi key on the nameplate.), click ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=32647)to connect. 

                                     ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=32648)


                                     ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=32649) 

 3.Input WiFi Key in the dialog of password input then click![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=32650) to establish connection(The WiFi Key and the SSID can be found on a label stick inside the back cover) 

                           ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=32654) 

 4.After the icon of wireless network card turned from![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=32652)(status of acquiring IP address ) into![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=32653) ,your PC has established WiFi connection with B593s-931 successfully, enter http://192.168.1.1 in web browser (ex. IE) to visit Web UI
